Reviews.Content: perfect stay sultanahmet experience hotel exceeded expectations family run hotel excellent people look time 4th time istanbul definitely book hotel time

Reviews.Content: hotel completely exceeded expectations clean comfortable shower hotel throughout 2week trip turkey breakfast spread decent runs hotel stand staff coupled facilities staff especially welcoming charming walked hagia sofia musuem 10 mins link tour guide staff shared practical advise protect ourselves tourists offered tea everytime usually spend 10 minutes lobby day catching chatting friendly staff staff responsive internet short fixed jiffy informed reception location 10 mins walk historic city grand bazaar stay hotel night istanbul trip arranged airlines rescheduled flight hotel pales comparison cesme hotel staff exhibited 5star service hotel stayed turkey staying time istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel Experience in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: jennifer b
Reviews.Content: friend spent 6 nights cesme hotel wonderful experience struck immediately hotel arrival clean modern design hospitality staff located heart city cesme ideal day walking istanbul visiting sights hotel construction comfortable clean bathrooms minibar own food snacks free internet personalized climate control satellite television hot water heater coffee tea complimentary breakfast morning served terraces cakes cheese eggs meat cereal fruit tomatoes cucumbers jams honey hotel rooftop terrace comfortable lounge furniture breathtaking views city onto marmara sea appreciated hotel incredibly helpful welcoming staff taking personally recommended restaurant helping carry purchases offering tea return evening staff couldnt attentive return istanbul definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very good price/quality ratio”
Reviews.Author: alikus
Reviews.Content: located heart city 5 mins main attractions beautiful view bosphorus breakfast terrace clean condition breakfast mediocre left 9 start 8 hey price paid 135 eur 3 nights super bargain hopefully neighbours wont loud hear people talking

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel beautiful istanbul clean quiet polite staff simple decent breakfast five minutes walk blue mosque ayasofya ten minutes topkapi palace twenty minutes excellent heating free wi fi safe box thank hope soon

Reviews.Content: location minutes walk major attractions reasonable price clean modern staff warm hospitable arrived 8 am overnight bus ride free 4 hours sleep ready free charge terrace view stay definitely recommend

Reviews.Content: happy stays cesme stayed nights precruise 204 night 303 postcruise happy clean roomy modern facilities incl wifi booked internet nz excellent communication hotel prior arrival notice particular noise windows closed aircon comfortable hesitate stay hotel placed visit main sites istanbul loved terrace rooftop actually level outside breakfast mentioned previous review enjoyed bosphorous views view neighbouring mosque staff cesme helpful organised cars hotel cruise ship qualified car airport staying nights add nice breakfast served lovely staff thank cesme

Reviews.Title: “Some things to be aware of”

Reviews.Content: hotel clean modern standard furniture ac beds bathrooms etc booked 4 nights stay hadnt booked advance moved else lobby essential breakfast terrace overlook beautiful bosphorous views overlooks rooftops neighbours gap glimpse sea sit table breakfasts substantial 2nd floor 203 deafened traffic struggling hill hotel situated bottom hill car pass lot rows street couldnt window easily endured noise hotel prepared found staff indifferent basically polite money sort hill quieter
